items.headline: Processing a million word text corpus using Pyspark and Window SQL

items.title: Getting started with Linux Administration
items.headline: Prepare for LPIC1-101-500
objectives_summary: This course will mold you from novice to intermediate Linux Administrator.
In almost 8 hours of video you will master the most common tasks related to Linux Administration.
The videos contain demonstrations that you can either perform yourself or simply study.
